summary: Dorothy and Bob DeBolt's tale of the struggles and joys involved in their 19 adopted children, many of who are physically disabled war orphans.
cast: Kim Atwood|Marty Atwood|Mike Atwood|Mimi Atwood|Noel Atwood|Stephanie Atwood|Anh DeBolt|Bob DeBolt|Dat DeBolt|Dorothy DeBolt|J.R. DeBolt|Karen DeBolt|Ly' DeBolt|Mary DeBolt|Melanie DeBolt|Phong DeBolt|Sunee DeBolt|Tich DeBolt|Trang DeBolt|Twe' DeBolt|Wendy DeBolt|Sydney Walker|Henry Winkler|Jacque Gonzales|David MacMillan
keywords: war orphan|diversity|documentary subject's name in title|punctuation in title|long title
title: Who Are the DeBolts? and Where Did They Get Nineteen Kids?
